data.text: A harsh, cold day on the Training Course in January-
data.processed: <story>A harsh, cold day on the Training Course in January-

data.text:
There, lots of Classic grade Uma Musume spend their days training 
in prepartion for the Classic Cup starting in the spring.
data.processed:
<story>There, lots of Classic grade Uma Musume spend their days training 
<story>in prepartion for the Classic Cup starting in the spring.

data.text:
If you want to challenge Classic Races, you only have a few 
chances in spring to get results! The fight has already begun!
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>If you want to challenge Classic Races, you only have a few 
<story>chances in spring to get results! The fight has already begun!

data.text: Yes! Trainer!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed: <story>Yes! Trainer!

data.text: Oh man, everyone's getting all fired up.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Oh man, everyone's getting all fired up.

data.text:
Classic races can only be challenged that one year you're in 
Classic grade, and if you don't, there's no second chances.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Classic races can only be challenged that one year you're in 
<story>Classic grade, and if you don't, there's no second chances.

data.text:
Classic races can only be challenged that one year you're in 
Classic grade, and if you don't, there's no second chances.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Classic races can only be challenged that one year you're in 
<story>Classic grade, and if you don't, there's no second chances.

data.text: Yes, that's why so many Uma Musume aspire to and aim for them.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Yes, that's why so many Uma Musume aspire to and aim for them.

data.text:
Buuuuut, we have someone here who took all 
those precious Classic Races for herself.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Buuuuut, we have someone here who took all 
<story>those precious Classic Races for herself.

data.text: …don't say it like I'm the bad guy here.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>…don't say it like I'm the bad guy here.

data.text: Even you could grab hold of that glory, if you ran seriously.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Even you could grab hold of that glory, if you ran seriously.

data.text:
Hey! I'm always serious though! 
Obviously I plan on winning a Classic Race or two!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Hey! I'm always serious though! 
<story>Obviously I plan on winning a Classic Race or two!

data.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOOA!!!)
data.processed: <story>(WHOOOOOOOOOOA!!!)

data.text:
See, can't you hear that? The loud cheering from 
fans expecting big things from GolShi-chan!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>See, can't you hear that? The loud cheering from 
<story>fans expecting big things from GolShi-chan!

data.text:
What are they cheering for? 
There must be something exciting happening over there.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>What are they cheering for? 
<story>There must be something exciting happening over there.

data.text: Are you ignoring me?!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Are you ignoring me?!

data.text: Haa… haa… fuu…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa… haa… fuu…

data.text: She beat her best time again!
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed: <story>She beat her best time again!

data.text:
I had heard there was a promising newcomer Debuting soon, and it 
definitely looks like she has plenty of potential!
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>I had heard there was a promising newcomer Debuting soon, and it 
<story>definitely looks like she has plenty of potential!

data.text:
Keep it up, Suzuka. 
That speed you have is wonderful.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Keep it up, Suzuka. 
<story>That speed you have is wonderful.

data.text:
For now, let's gather experience for your Debut 
race, and polish that specialty of yours.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>For now, let's gather experience for your Debut 
<story>race, and polish that specialty of yours.

data.text: Yes, understood.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yes, understood.

data.text: They're cheering for… Suzuka, it seems.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>They're cheering for… Suzuka, it seems.

data.text: You know her?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>You know her?

data.text: You know her?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>You know her?

data.text:
What, you don't know her? Remember how there was 
that one girl, rumored to have tons of potential, 
that was absent when we enrolled?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>What, you don't know her? Remember how there was 
<story>that one girl, rumored to have tons of potential, 
<story>that was absent when we enrolled?

data.text: Her Debut is finally coming up. I'm looking forward to the race.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Her Debut is finally coming up. I'm looking forward to the race.

data.text:
The second time I heard Silence Suzuka's name come up, was 
several weeks later at the Kyoto race course.
data.processed:
<story>The second time I heard Silence Suzuka's name come up, was 
<story>several weeks later at the Kyoto race course.

data.text:
There are alot of media people here, huh? 
You're also here for Silence Suzuka's debut, aren't you?
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>There are alot of media people here, huh? 
<story>You're also here for Silence Suzuka's debut, aren't you?

data.text:
Of course! We have 4 cameramen waiting. What kind of run are you 
expecting that that new star will show us?
data.name: Reporter C
data.processed:
<story>Of course! We have 4 cameramen waiting. What kind of run are you 
<story>expecting that that new star will show us?

data.text: Sounds like today is Silence Suzuka's debut race.
data.processed: <story>Sounds like today is Silence Suzuka's debut race.

data.text:
Even in school there are rumors about her, I wonder 
what she's like? While thinking that-
data.processed:
<story>Even in school there are rumors about her, I wonder 
<story>what she's like? While thinking that-

data.text: You're <Siruis>'s trainer, right?
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>You're <Siruis>'s trainer, right?

data.text:
I'm Air Groove. Student Council Vice President. 
You've probably at least heard the name, haven't you?
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>I'm Air Groove. Student Council Vice President. 
<story>You've probably at least heard the name, haven't you?

data.text:
Just like a normal school, Tracen Academy has a student council, 
who's role is to support the students on behalf of the school.
data.processed:
<story>Just like a normal school, Tracen Academy has a student council, 
<story>who's role is to support the students on behalf of the school.

data.text:
Speaking of which, Narita Brian is also a member 
of the student council. It's so unexpected that 
sometimes the team members tease her about it.
data.processed:
<story>Speaking of which, Narita Brian is also a member 
<story>of the student council. It's so unexpected that 
<story>sometimes the team members tease her about it.

data.text:
If I recall correctly, nobody from <Sirius> is participating today… 
Are you perhaps here to see Suzuka's race?
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>If I recall correctly, nobody from <Sirius> is participating today… 
<story>Are you perhaps here to see Suzuka's race?

data.text:
Nah, we're just here by coincidence. 
How about you, are you here to see Silence Suzuka's race?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Nah, we're just here by coincidence. 
<story>How about you, are you here to see Silence Suzuka's race?

data.text:
Nah, we're just here by coincidence. 
How about you, are you here to see Silence Suzuka's race?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Nah, we're just here by coincidence. 
<story>How about you, are you here to see Silence Suzuka's race?

data.text:
Suzuka is an acquaintance of mine. 
On top of that, she has the attention of the student council.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka is an acquaintance of mine. 
<story>On top of that, she has the attention of the student council.

data.text: The Student Council's attention…?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>The Student Council's attention…?

data.text:
Yeah, it seems President Rudolph also 
has high expectations for her.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, it seems President Rudolph also 
<story>has high expectations for her.

data.text:
Oh?…She's got Student Council President Symboli 
Rudolph's attention? I'm suddenly becoming more 
interested in Silence Suzuka's race now.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Oh?…She's got Student Council President Symboli 
<story>Rudolph's attention? I'm suddenly becoming more 
<story>interested in Silence Suzuka's race now.

data.text:
Oh?…She's got Student Council President Symboli 
Rudolph's attention? I'm suddenly becoming more 
interested in Silence Suzuka's race now.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Oh?…She's got Student Council President Symboli 
<story>Rudolph's attention? I'm suddenly becoming more 
<story>interested in Silence Suzuka's race now.

data.text:
And when I saw her running with my own eyes, 
my interest only began to increase further-
data.processed:
<story>And when I saw her running with my own eyes, 
<story>my interest only began to increase further-

data.text: Silence Suzuka is still in the lead entering the final corner!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed: <story>Silence Suzuka is still in the lead entering the final corner!

data.text:
And she increases her lead even further! 
Silence Suzuka, accelerates even more in to the final straight!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>And she increases her lead even further! 
<story>Silence Suzuka, accelerates even more in to the final straight!

data.text: Only 200m remain! Silence Suzuka continues to extend her lead!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed: <story>Only 200m remain! Silence Suzuka continues to extend her lead!

data.text:
Silence Suzuka led from start to finish, and her sprint on the 
straight increased her lead even further.
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka led from start to finish, and her sprint on the 
<story>straight increased her lead even further.

data.text:
So strong!! 5 lengths, 6 lengths!! 
How much more does she intend to extend her lead?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>So strong!! 5 lengths, 6 lengths!! 
<story>How much more does she intend to extend her lead?!

data.text:
Silence Suzuka, reaches the goal!! 
She's marked her debut with a victory!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka, reaches the goal!! 
<story>She's marked her debut with a victory!!

data.text:
Of course I was surprised by her strength, 
but what left a bigger impression was-
data.processed:
<story>Of course I was surprised by her strength, 
<story>but what left a bigger impression was-

data.text: All right! You did it Suzuka!
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>All right! You did it Suzuka!

data.text:
Ah… ahem. 
How was it? Suzuka's run, that is.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>Ah… ahem. 
<story>How was it? Suzuka's run, that is.

data.text: Yeah…! Her run was awesome, but more than that-
data.name: <username>

choices.text: She looked like she was having so much fun!
choices.processed: <size=37>She looked like she was having so much fun!</size>

choices.text: She looked like she was having so much fun!
choices.processed: <size=37>She looked like she was having so much fun!</size>

data.processed: <story>Yeah…! Her run was awesome, but more than that-

choices.text: She looked like she was having so much fun!
choices.processed: <size=37>She looked like she was having so much fun!</size>

choices.text: She looked like she was having so much fun!
choices.processed: <size=37>She looked like she was having so much fun!</size>

data.processed: <story>Yeah…! Her run was awesome, but more than that-

data.text: Having fun…?
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>Having fun…?

data.text:
I see. So <Sirius>'s trainer… 
Can sense that kind of thing.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>I see. So <Sirius>'s trainer… 
<story>Can sense that kind of thing.

data.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAA!!!!!!)
data.processed: <story>(WHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAA!!!!!!)

data.text: Haa… haaa…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa… haaa…

data.text: …Fufuu.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Fufuu.
